definitions.definition: An amount of time or a particular time interval .
examples: The duration of the flight will be about 2 hours 45 minutes.
She was moaning for the entire duration of the advert break.

definitions.definition: The time taken for the current situation to end, especially the current war .
examples: Rationing will last at least for the duration .
definitions.label_groups: in the singular, not followed by "of"

definitions.definition: A measure of the sensitivity of the price of a financial asset to changes in interest rates, computed for a simple bond as a weighted average of the maturities of the interest and principal payments associated with it.

main_definition: An amount of time or a particular time interval .
secondary_definitions: ( in the singular, not followed by "of" ) The time taken for the current situation to end, especially the current war .

( finance ) A measure of the sensitivity of the price of a financial asset to changes in interest rates, computed for a simple bond as a weighted average of the maturities of the interest and principal payments associated with it.
